backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles, ambulance locations, SOS alerts, and access control with role-based authorization.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON structure.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining OKLCH color variables and light/dark theme tokens.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling authentication, profile setup, and routing between ambulance and police interfaces.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component showing attribution and styling.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header displaying branding, user identity, role badge, and logout controls.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Login screen prompting users to authenticate via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Form for entering name and selecting ambulance or police role, saving the profile to backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that initializes and manages the authenticated backend actor, refetching queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, including login, logout, and identity loading states.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profiles, ambulance locations, and SOS alert operations by interacting with backend actor methods.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind CSS base styles and defines light/dark theme variables, including emergency color schemes and gradient backgrounds.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AmbulanceInterface.ts: Provides an ambulance UI that tracks geolocation, sends periodic updates, and manages SOS activation with autoâ€‘deactivation.
frontend/src/pages/PoliceInterface.tsx: Displays nearby ambulances and active SOS alerts, playing sounds for new alerts and tracking officer location.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session storage values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom colors, animations, container settings, and includes typography, container-query, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project state, known issues, and three pending feature requests focused on fixing loading hangs, improving error reporting, and handling geolocation permission failures.
